sentences.en: And he sent out arrows and scattered them ; lightning and discomfited them.
sentences.cn: 15他射出箭来,使 仇敌 四散,发出闪电,使他们扰乱.

sentences.en: Discomfited, I sink onto the bed and take a sip of tea.
sentences.cn: 我感到有点沮丧, 坐回到床边,喝了口茶.

sentences.en: He was discomfited by the unexpected questions.
sentences.cn: 意料不到的问题使得他十分尴尬.

sentences.en: If you are discomfited by this preoccupation, then you have an alcohol problem.
sentences.cn: 如果你被这种酒癖弄得狼狈不堪, 那末酒对你才真正成了问题.

sentences.en: Poor Danglars looked so crest - fallen and discomfited that Monte Cristo assumed a pitying air towards him.
sentences.cn: 腾格拉尔此时的神色简直沮丧和狼狈极了,基督山装出一种怜悯的神情.

sentences.en: She sank into the proffered chair, glaring at the discomfited fat captain, and gave her name.
sentences.cn: 她在挪过来的椅子坐下, 瞪着眼睛看着显得很尴尬的胖队长, 报了自己名字.

sentences.en: The invading army discomfited in every battle.
sentences.cn: 那支入侵的军队屡战屡败.

sentences.en: The opposition leader has regularly discomfited him in parliament.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人常搞得他在国会中下不来台。

sentences.en: What an ass I am, he thought, somewhat discomfited.
sentences.cn: 他有些伤感地想, 我真是个大笨蛋.

sentences.en: Will wanted to do likewise, but felt too discomfited.
sentences.cn: 威尔也想照着做，但觉得太难堪了。

sentences.en: Yea, he sent out his arrows and scattered and he shot out lightnings and discomfited them.
sentences.cn: 14他射出箭来,使仇敌四散;多多发出闪电,使他们扰乱.

trans.tran_cn: 使为难( discomfit的过去式和过去分词)，使狼狈，使挫折，挫败
